Authors: Meiryani, Lindawati A., Andrian T., Cindani N.A.
Title: The effect of accounting training on accounting information in small and medium micro enterprises
Affiliations: Accounting Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Meiryani, Accounting Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Lindawati, A., Accounting Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Andrian, T., Accounting Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Cindani, N.A., Accounting Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: The purpose of this study was to determine the analysis the effect of accounting training on accounting information in SMEs of Tangerang City. The data's are analysed using descriptive statistics and multiple linear regression models with SPSS 21 Program. The sampling method for the study used the Random Sampling method and the result is 51 SMEs owner's in the Tangerang City. The result of this study indicate that accounting training significantly influence applied of accounting information. © 2020 EManuscript Technologies. All rights reserved.
Author Keywords: Accounting information; Accounting Training; Decision Making; SME
Index Keywords: data analysis software; decision making; review
